attributes.additional_details:
If we do nothing and stick with opening some schools and closing others in areas that are bad it just gives Covid a lifeline , We need to have a lockdown because if we do not the UK economy will suffer alot more in the long run .
A lockdown is the only way forward and more strict measures need to be in place for those who break the rules , Today as we go into 2021 Covid is out of control and hospitals are under massive strain , Lets prevent a further mess and do the right thing and LOCKDOWN!!
attributes.background: The new variant of covid is rapidly spreading across the UK now and our NHS is suffering and on the brink of collapse , The lockdown worked for us, we need it again! . The vaccine is here and to prevent a total disaster we need to lockdown now to reduce the devastation Covid is doing to this country

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced a new national lockdown.

You can read the Prime Minister's announcement of new Covid-19 restrictions here: https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/prime-ministers-address-to-the-nation-4-january-2021
